text: Úlfljótsvatn (, Úlfljótr's Lake) is a lake in southern Iceland, to the south of lake Þingvallavatn and 74 km east of Reykjavik. lfljótsvatn is named after lfljótr, an important man who was part of the Alþingi (the Icelandic Parliament) in 930. == References == Category:Geography of Iceland Category:Lakes of Europe
title: Úlfljótsvatn (lake)
